name: SplitShotZombie
description:
This was a submission for the trijam 201 game jam with the theme "you got one shot."

Had some last minute issues and went about an hour over time and still couldn't get sound to work. Any feedback would be appreciated. I had help from https://itch.io/profile/identityfluid and https://itch.io/profile/thesecondandroid with this one.
